title: AI engineer
description:
We are looking for a passionate and driven AI & Data Science Engineer to join our team. As a fresh graduate with hands-on experience in machine learning, NLP, and web development, you’ll help build intelligent applications, conduct data analysis, and collaborate on cutting-edge projects involving AI tools and frameworks.

Key Responsibilities
Develop, test, and deploy ML/DL models using Python and TensorFlow.

Work on Natural Language Processing tasks and solutions.

Analyze structured and unstructured datasets to derive actionable insights.

Create dashboards and reports using Power BI or similar tools.

Collaborate with frontend developers using React.js and Node.js.

Contribute to real-world applications such as AI-powered web tools, content generators, and chatbots.

Participate in brainstorming sessions, project planning, and technical documentation.

Required Qualifications
B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science or equivalent (2022–2025).

Strong foundation in Python, SQL, and data structures.

Practical knowledge of TensorFlow, Keras, and NLP techniques.

Familiarity with PostgreSQL and version control (GitHub).

Internship experience in AI/Web development.

Preferred Skills
Experience building AI projects (e.g., digit classifiers, SEO rewriters).

Ability to work with APIs and LLMs (e.g., OpenAI GPT).

Exposure to vector databases (e.g., FAISS).

Frontend skills in React.js and backend basics in Node.js/Express.

Knowledge of digital marketing principles and AI use-cases in SEO.

What You’ll Get
Real-world projects using AI and GenAI technologies.

Opportunity to contribute to AI tools for content, SEO, and databases.

A collaborative environment where innovation is encouraged.

Mentorship and training in AI/ML industry practices.
